alert.note: Alert for Charlotte; Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 3:42PM EST until January 11 at 7:45AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central Virginia, including the following counties, Charlotte and Halifax. * WHEN...Until 700 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 341 PM EST, Stream and river gauges indicate flooding in Charlotte and Halifax Counties. Small streams and smaller rivers will fall through early evening. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... South Boston, Halifax, Charlotte Court House, Phenix, Virgilina, Clover and Nathalie. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
